items.headline: ‘She absolutely cannot afford this procedure’: My friend, 61, signed a $20K contract for dental implants. Can she fight it?

items.headline: Tommy Hilfiger parent says it still expects 2025 to be a comeback year, even as tariffs upend clothing industry
